column3: str
A pleasure to see you again. Have you come to meet more Yo-kai? Or perhaps browse my array of special goods?
Well if it isn't the master weapons collector <hex:020815E905FF08>herself<hex:FF08>himself<hex:03>! How may I be of service to you?
What would you like to do?
Purchase minions.
Purchase weapons.
Small talk.
Cancel.
Which minion will you choose?<hex:02100103>(Yo-kai Medals Required: <hex:022003E80203>, Bag: <hex:022003E80303>)
<hex:02280FFF0A>Companion<hex:E8020103>.
Cancel.
Choose this minion?
Yes
No
Why, you've befriended all the Yo-kai I've brought with me! Might it be said that you're quite taken by them? If so, I suggest you come and visit my homeland where you can find more. So many more.
Hmm... You appear to be lacking the required medals. Apologies, but business is business─I'll have to ask you to come back when you've found some more.
Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following areas:

The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North<hex:02100103>La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer<hex:02100103>Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern<hex:02100103>Coerthas Western Highlands, the Sea of Clouds, the Dravanian Forelands, the Churning Mists, and the Dravanian Hinterlands
Azys Lla, the Fringes, the Peaks, the Lochs, the Ruby Sea, Yanxia, the Azim Steppe
Unable to obtain <hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.
Let's get you acquainted, then. Meet your new friend, <hex:02280FFF0A>Companion<hex:E8020103>! I hope you two will get along!
Which weapon will you purchase?

<hex:0208F201A4E4E802F23B68FF10>Paladin's Sword<hex:FFF20189><hex:0208F20183E4E802F23B69FF0E>Monk's Fists.<hex:FFF2016A><hex:0208F20164E4E802F23B6AFF0F>Warrior's Axe.<hex:FFF2014A><hex:0208F20144E4E802F23B6BFF11>Dragoon's Spear.<hex:FFF20128><hex:0208F20122E4E802F23B6CFF0C>Bard's Bow.<hex:FFF2010B><hex:0208F20105E4E802F23B6DFF10>Ninja's Knives.<hex:FFF0EB><hex:0208F0E6E4E802F23B6EFF18>Dark Knight's Claymore.<hex:FFC6><hex:0208C2E4E802F23B6FFF17>Machinist's Musketoon.<hex:FFA2><hex:02089EE4E802F23B70FF13>White Mage's Cane.<hex:FF82><hex:02087EE4E802F23B71FF12>Black Mage's Rod.<hex:FF63><hex:02085FE4E802F23B72FF15>Summoner's Grimoire.<hex:FF41><hex:02083DE4E802F23B73FF11>Scholar's Codex.<hex:FF23><hex:02081FE4E802F23B74FF15>Astrologian's Globe.<hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:020815E4E80301FF01><hex:FF0D> and Shield.<hex:03> (<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8040103>: <hex:022003E80503>/<hex:022003E80603>)
Cancel.
Purchase this weapon?
Yes
No

I'm afraid you'll have to come back when you acquire some Legendary Medals. I understand obtaining such rare pieces can be difficult, but think of the marvelous rewards you will reap for your efforts! I believe in you!
Legendary Yo-kai Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.
Cannot obtain <hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103> and <hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8030103> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the items.
Cannot obtain <hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.
Sword and shield, eh? That's my favorite kind. Here you are, your <hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020103> and <hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8030103>.
Here you are, your new weapon! Go on, try it out!
The number of Legendary Yo-kai Medals required to purchase Yo-kai weapons from Nohi has increased. Participate in FATEs to earn more medals.

Why did I choose to travel to Eorzea? Aside from business, I also came to visit a friend of mine. He's prone to wandering himself, but I always know when he's close by the jangling sound he makes when he walks.
Speaking of jangling, I found my coin pouch rather empty after I arrived at the Gold Saucer. I must have dropped some medals from my homeland when I made my way here after searching for Whisper.
Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following areas:

The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North<hex:02100103>La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer<hex:02100103>Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern<hex:02100103>Coerthas Western Highlands, the Sea of Clouds, the Dravanian Forelands, the Churning Mists, and the Dravanian Hinterlands
Azys Lla, the Fringes, the Peaks, the Lochs, the Ruby Sea, Yanxia, the Azim Steppe
Legendary Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs in areas designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.

The Yo-kai Medallium can be accessed from the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Collection<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> menu or the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Minion Guide<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
This must be one of the finest exchanges I've had in my travels. I cannot recall the last time an adventurer purchased so many of my weapons. I must say I'm impressed!
Ah! It appears my old friend has come to visit me. Well, don't be shy, now! Come on over!
My apologies, Nohi. I did not want to intrude on what looked like a lively conversation between the two of you.

I'll say. <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203> just finished acquiring thirteen of my finest weapons! Built <hex:020815E905FF08>herself<hex:FF08>himself<hex:03> quite an arsenal, <hex:02080CE905FF04>she<hex:FF03>he<hex:03> did!
Thirteen!? Well then, allow me to extend my congratulations to you as well.
It must have been as tedious as taming a warlion. I can imagine how thrilled you must feel, having obtained long sought-after rewards.
Yes indeed, tantalizing rewards, for adventurers who throw themselves headfirst into the heat of <hex:021A020203>savage<hex:021A020103> battles. Wouldn't you agree, my minstrel friend?
W─Wait just a moment, we need not discuss such complicated matters now. After all, we are in the midst of celebrating <hex:02080DE905FF04>her<hex:FF04>his<hex:03> achievement, are we not?
Indeed. It's a shame my stay in Eorzea is only temporary. I'm rather curious to see what becomes of your story. Rather, on behalf of my company, I would like to─
Right, have fun, you two!
Hey, come back here! I still have some affairs to speak with you about! Hmph. He's always so elusive when I mention the savagery of combat.
Nevertheless, I was saying perhaps we can go on an adventure on our own somewhere in the future. As friends! Until then, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>.
Purchase weapons (DoW).
Purchase weapons (DoM).

<hex:0208F20237E4E802F23B68FF10>Paladin's Sword<hex:FFF2021C><hex:0208F20216E4E802F23B69FF0E>Monk's Fists.<hex:FFF201FD><hex:0208F201F7E4E802F23B6AFF0F>Warrior's Axe.<hex:FFF201DD><hex:0208F201D7E4E802F23B6BFF11>Dragoon's Spear.<hex:FFF201BB><hex:0208F201B5E4E802F23B6CFF0C>Bard's Bow.<hex:FFF2019E><hex:0208F20198E4E802F23B6DFF10>Ninja's Knives.<hex:FFF2017D><hex:0208F20177E4E802F23B6EFF18>Dark Knight's Claymore.<hex:FFF20154><hex:0208F2014EE4E802F23B6FFF17>Machinist's Musketoon.<hex:FFF2012C><hex:0208F20126E4E802F23B70FF13>White Mage's Cane.<hex:FFF20108><hex:0208F20102E4E802F23B71FF12>Black Mage's Rod.<hex:FFF0E6><hex:0208F0E1E4E802F23B72FF15>Summoner's Grimoire.<hex:FFC4><hex:0208C0E4E802F23B73FF11>Scholar's Codex.<hex:FFA6><hex:0208A2E4E802F23B74FF15>Astrologian's Globe.<hex:FF84><hex:020880E4E802F27857FF12>Samurai's Katana.<hex:FF65><hex:020861E4E802F27858FF13>Red Mage's Rapier.<hex:FF45><hex:020841E4E802F27859FF17>Gunbreaker's Gunblade.<hex:FF21><hex:02081DE4E802F2785AFF13>Dancer's Chakrams.<hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:020815E4E80301FF01><hex:FF0D> and Shield.<hex:03> (<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8040103>: <hex:022003E80503>/<hex:022003E80603>)

My word! It seems you have claimed one of each of the weapons I have on offer. I cannot imagine how you could possibly carry such an arsenal, let alone actually use it, but I feel congratulations are in order.
And it would appear that another unlikely event is about to unfold, for my friend the minstrel has returned from his wandering.

I do hope I am not interrupting your celebrations...but am I to understand that someone has at last collected a full set of those charming instruments of destruction? A fine achievement, even if only for achievement's sake.
To have done so in such a short span of time is commendable indeed. Perhaps I should have charged more for them?
If you had, I have no doubt this fine young adventurer would have risen to the challenge regardless.
But rather than speak on your behalf, mayhap you might share your thoughts on this momentous undertaking?
What will you say?
Collecting a load of superfluous knickknacks is what I do best!
I feel my efforts were amply rewarded.
I'd rather scrub a behemoth's backside than do that again...
Most admirable! And for what it's worth, it was an honor to supply you with said knickknacks.
In which case, I can rest assured that the challenge I set was both fair and worthwhile for all involved.
Well, I daresay it was character-building in some way. After all, a bit of seemingly pointless drudgery never killed anyone. Or at least I don't think it did...
In any case, the deed is done, and the time has come for me to bid you farewell. Until our paths next cross, adventurer!
Where might his wandering take him next, I, ah...wonder.
Like him, you are also not wont to stay in one place overlong. I pray that when next we meet, we might have some new tales to share. Take care, my friend.
Purchase framer's kit.
The <hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:04F2A345020203> costs <hex:022206E802FF022C03> MGP.
Purchase <hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2A345020203> for <hex:022206E802FF022C03> MGP?<hex:02100103>You currently possess <hex:022206E803FF022C03>.
Unable to obtain <hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2A345020203>. You already have received one.
Unable to obtain <hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2A345020203> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.

Terribly sorry, but this prize is meant only for those who have befriended each and every Yo-kai. If you wish to earn it, you can start by gathering Yo-kai Medals and growing your circle of companions!
You have proven yourself a loyal friend to Yo-kai of all shapes and sizes, and for that, you deserve this. A singular gift to reward your singular devotion!
Insufficient MGP. <hex:022206E802FF022C03> MGP is needed to complete the purchase.
